::KitKat::

She opened her link,"I got news for you. He's firing on the ship 
right now."  She looked at the console and sighed. She knew that 
Megatron was here to settle things with her and her alone.  She 
thought that if she just turned herself over to him, he would leave 
her pack alone. She looked at the clone and hoped she was makinghte 
right choice.  She stood up and looked at the clone.  She then looked 
around the ship's bridge. She didn't want her troops to get hurt just 
because of her. She didn't think that she was worth it.  She opened 
her link tothe outside of the ship. "What is it that you slagging 
bots want?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Magnus turned with sudden alert. His dl of the oracal allowed him

pred base. He

good. He

>   Destructor answered.."No he is our most ruthless enimie."
>  "Well then I suggest you get your men and some of the maximals to 
help you. 
> Cuz he is headed right at your base." Destructor's eyes 
widened.."No!!" he 
> flew off to the base opening his comm on the way to grimmler 
ramulus and kit 
> kat.."Preds are headed to my base,. I need you two maximals to help 
it will 
> be lost. Kit kat megatron is on his way. Be ready"
